design1.title: Modular Kitchen Designs
design1.description: What are Modular Kitchens? Modular Kitchen Designs are a seamless fusion of functionality and style, crafted to enhance modern Indian homes. Whether you're redesigning a compact apartment or a spacious residence, our modular kitchen designs offer smart solutions tailored to your lifestyle. From clean, minimalist layouts to more detailed and ornate finishes, every design reflects contemporary aesthetics with a focus on practicality. What are different layout of modular kitchen? Ideal for those who value space optimisation and sleek interiors, these designs suit various kitchen layouts—be it L-shaped, U-shaped, parallel, or open kitchen plans. The adaptability of modular kitchens makes them perfect for urban homes where efficiency and elegance go hand in hand. Stay ahead with the latest trends in 2026 with our kitchen interior design, including matte finishes, handle-less cabinets, open shelving, and smart storage solutions. Our curated collection keeps pace with evolving preferences, ensuring every kitchen feels fresh, functional, and stylish. All Modular Kitchen designs are fully customisable to match your space, taste, and budget. Explore our top modular kitchen designs and transform your culinary space into a beautiful, efficient hub for everyday living.

design2.title: Wardrobe Designs
design2.description: Wardrobe Designs combine smart storage with modern aesthetics to suit contemporary Indian homes. Designed for both compact and spacious bedrooms, these wardrobes help maximise space while enhancing interior style. Available in sliding, hinged, corner, and walk-in formats, they adapt easily to different room layouts. Featuring 2026 trends like matte finishes, handle-less shutters, mirrors, and smart internal storage, our wardrobe designs focus on everyday convenience and visual appeal. All designs are fully customisable to match your space, storage needs, style, and budget—creating an organised, elegant bedroom.Explore our top wardrobe designs and transform your bedroom into a clutter-free, stylish sanctuary that reflects your personal taste and lifestyle.

sutterFinish.finish1: - Shore: Laminate in high gloss finish
sutterFinish.finish2: - Frosty white and tahiti samoa teak: Laminate in matte finish

storageFeature.feature1: - The wardrobe includes full-height hanging sections for neatly organising formal wear, dresses, and long garments without creasing.
storageFeature.feature2: - Multiple internal shelves and compartments provide dedicated space for folded clothes, accessories, and daily essentials.
storageFeature.feature3: - Smooth pull-out drawers at the base allow easy storage of smaller items like innerwear, belts, and personal accessories.
storageFeature.feature4: - Overhead cabinets utilise vertical space efficiently, offering additional storage for seasonal items, luggage, and extra bedding.

specialFeature.specialFeature1: - A built-in pull-out accessory organiser keeps watches, jewellery, and valuables arranged and easily accessible.
specialFeature.specialFeature2: - Sliding or soft-close hinged doors ensure smooth operation while enhancing space efficiency and modern functionality.
specialFeature.specialFeature3: - Integrated mirror panels provide convenience for dressing while enhancing the sense of space in the room.
specialFeature.specialFeature4: - Dedicated sections for shoes and handbags help maintain organisation while preserving the wardrobe’s clean and elegant appearance.

design3.title: Bathroom Designs
design3.description: Bathroom Designs are thoughtfully crafted to balance comfort, functionality, and modern aesthetics for Indian homes. Whether it’s a compact bathroom or a spacious luxury setup, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and ease of use. Featuring 2026 trends like matte tiles, wall-mounted vanities, glass partitions, and sleek fittings, these bathroom designs create a clean, relaxing atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—turning everyday routines into a refined experience.

sutterFinish.finish1: - Shore: Laminate in high gloss finish
sutterFinish.finish2: - Frosty white and tahiti samoa teak: Laminate in matte finish

storageFeature.feature1: - The vanity unit includes spacious drawers and cabinets to neatly organise toiletries, cleaning supplies, and daily essentials.
storageFeature.feature2: - Wall-mounted storage cabinets make efficient use of vertical space while keeping frequently used items within easy reach.
storageFeature.feature3: - Open and closed shelving sections provide dedicated areas for towels, personal care products, and decorative accessories.
storageFeature.feature4: - Hidden storage compartments beneath the sink maximise functionality while maintaining a clean and uncluttered appearance.

specialFeature.specialFeature1: - A mirror cabinet with integrated storage offers convenient access to essentials while enhancing the bathroom’s modern look.
specialFeature.specialFeature2: - Floating vanity design creates a spacious feel while allowing easy floor cleaning and improved hygiene.
specialFeature.specialFeature3: - Built-in niches within the shower area provide practical storage for shampoos and bath products without occupying extra space.
specialFeature.specialFeature4: - Soft-close drawers and moisture-resistant materials ensure durability and smooth functionality in humid environments.

images.shortDesc: Perfect for compact homes with bathroom.

design4.title: Master Bedroom Designs
design4.description: Master Bedroom Designs are thoughtfully crafted to create a serene, elegant retreat that reflects your personal style and lifestyle. Whether it's a compact or spacious bedroom, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like neutral tones, minimalist furniture, smart lighting, and custom storage solutions, these bedroom designs create a calming atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a harmonious and functional bedroom space.

sutterFinish.finish1: - Shore: Laminate in high gloss finish
sutterFinish.finish2: - Frosty white and tahiti samoa teak: Laminate in matte finish

storageFeature.feature1: - Full-height wardrobes provide ample space for organising clothing, accessories, and personal belongings in a structured manner.
storageFeature.feature2: - Built-in bedside units and drawers offer convenient storage for everyday essentials such as books, devices, and personal items.
storageFeature.feature3: - Overhead cabinets and loft storage efficiently utilise vertical space for storing seasonal items, luggage, and extra bedding.
storageFeature.feature4: - Integrated dresser units with multiple compartments help keep grooming essentials and accessories neatly organised.

specialFeature.specialFeature1: - A dedicated walk-in wardrobe or wardrobe zone enhances accessibility while creating a luxurious and organised dressing experience.
specialFeature.specialFeature2: - Bed frames with built-in storage drawers maximise space utilisation while maintaining a clean and clutter-free environment.
specialFeature.specialFeature3: - Integrated lighting within wardrobes and storage units improves visibility while adding a premium and elegant touch.
specialFeature.specialFeature4: - Multi-functional furniture elements combine storage and usability, ensuring both comfort and efficient space management.

design5.title: Living Room Designs
design5.description: Living Room Designs are thoughtfully crafted to create a welcoming, stylish space that reflects your personal taste and lifestyle. Whether it's a compact living room or a spacious lounge, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like neutral tones, minimalist furniture, smart lighting, and custom storage solutions, these living room designs create a warm and inviting atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a harmonious and functional living area.

sutterFinish.finish1: - Shore: Laminate in high gloss finish
sutterFinish.finish2: - Frosty white and tahiti samoa teak: Laminate in matte finish

storageFeature.feature1: - Built-in storage units and cabinets provide organised space for storing books, electronics, and everyday living room essentials.
storageFeature.feature2: - Floating shelves and wall-mounted units efficiently utilise vertical space while keeping frequently used items easily accessible.
storageFeature.feature3: - Closed cabinets help conceal clutter such as wires, accessories, and miscellaneous items, maintaining a clean and tidy appearance.
storageFeature.feature4: - Multi-purpose storage consoles and side units offer additional space for decorative items, media equipment, and household utilities.

specialFeature.specialFeature1: - A customised TV unit with integrated storage enhances functionality while serving as a stylish focal point of the room.
specialFeature.specialFeature2: - Display shelves with integrated lighting highlight décor pieces while adding depth and elegance to the living space.
specialFeature.specialFeature3: - Modular storage solutions allow flexible configuration to adapt to different layouts and changing storage needs.
specialFeature.specialFeature4: - Hidden storage compartments maintain a minimalist look while maximising practical storage capacity.

design6.title: Pooja Room Designs
design6.description: Puja Room Designs are thoughtfully crafted to create a serene, sacred space that reflects your spiritual beliefs and practices. Whether it's a compact puja room or a spacious prayer area, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance tranquility. Featuring 2026 trends like natural materials, soft lighting, minimalist decor, and custom storage solutions, these puja room designs create a peaceful atmosphere for worship and meditation. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a harmonious and functional puja room.

sutterFinish.finish1: - Shore: Laminate in high gloss finish
sutterFinish.finish2: - Frosty white and tahiti samoa teak: Laminate in matte finish

storageFeature.feature1: - Built-in cabinets and drawers provide dedicated storage for pooja essentials such as incense, diyas, books, and accessories.
storageFeature.feature2: - Open shelves and tiered platforms allow organised placement of idols, decorative items, and religious artefacts.
storageFeature.feature3: - Overhead storage units efficiently utilise vertical space for storing less frequently used items and festival essentials.
storageFeature.feature4: - Concealed compartments help maintain a clean and clutter-free environment while keeping pooja materials easily accessible.

specialFeature.specialFeature1: - Backlit panels and integrated lighting enhance the spiritual ambience while highlighting the main deity area.
specialFeature.specialFeature2: - Carved panels, jaali designs, or decorative partitions add elegance while defining the sacred space.
specialFeature.specialFeature3: - A dedicated platform or elevated base ensures proper placement of idols in accordance with traditional practices.
specialFeature.specialFeature4: - Compact and modular design allows seamless integration into modern homes without compromising functionality.

design7.title: TV Unit Designs
design7.description: TV Unit Designs are thoughtfully crafted to create a stylish, functional space that enhances your living room's aesthetics and usability. Whether it's a compact or spacious TV unit, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like minimalist aesthetics, smart storage solutions, and custom finishes, these TV unit designs create a harmonious and elegant atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a seamless integration with your existing decor.

sutterFinish.finish1: - Shore: Laminate in high gloss finish
sutterFinish.finish2: - Frosty white and tahiti samoa teak: Laminate in matte finish

storageFeature.feature1: - The TV unit includes closed cabinets and drawers to neatly store media accessories, remotes, and everyday essentials.
storageFeature.feature2: - Open shelves provide dedicated space for set-top boxes, gaming consoles, and decorative elements while ensuring easy accessibility.
storageFeature.feature3: - Wall-mounted storage compartments efficiently utilise vertical space while maintaining a clean and organised layout.
storageFeature.feature4: - Concealed sections help manage cables and wires, preserving a clutter-free and streamlined appearance.

specialFeature.specialFeature1: - Integrated back panel design enhances the visual appeal while creating a stylish focal point for the living area.
specialFeature.specialFeature2: - Built-in lighting highlights display sections and décor items, adding depth and a premium ambience.
specialFeature.specialFeature3: - Floating TV unit configuration creates a modern look while improving floor space and ease of cleaning.
specialFeature.specialFeature4: - Multi-functional design combines display, storage, and media organisation in a cohesive and elegant structure.

design12.title: Foyer Designs
design12.description: Foyer Designs are thoughtfully crafted to create a stylish, functional space that enhances your home's aesthetics and usability. Whether it's a compact or spacious foyer, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like minimalist aesthetics, smart lighting solutions, and custom finishes, these foyer designs create a harmonious and elegant atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a seamless integration with your existing decor.

Whether it's a compact or spacious kitchen, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like minimalist aesthetics, smart lighting solutions, and custom finishes, these kitchen designs create a harmonious and elegant atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a seamless integration with your existing decor.

design22.title: Study Room Designs
design22.description: Study Room Designs are thoughtfully crafted to create a stylish, functional space that enhances your home's aesthetics and usability. Whether it's a compact or spacious study room design, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like minimalist aesthetics, smart lighting solutions, and custom finishes, these study room designs create a harmonious and elegant atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a seamless integration with your existing decor.

storageFeature.feature2: - Desk-integrated drawers offer convenient space for storing stationery, documents, and daily essentials.
storageFeature.feature3: - Wall-mounted storage units efficiently utilise vertical space while keeping frequently used items accessible.
storageFeature.feature4: - Closed storage compartments help maintain a clean and distraction-free study environment.

design23.title: Kitchen Sinks
design23.description: Kitchen Sinks are thoughtfully crafted to create a stylish, functional space that enhances your home's aesthetics and usability. Whether it's a compact or spacious kitchen sink design, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like minimalist aesthetics, smart lighting solutions, and custom finishes, these kitchen sink designs create a harmonious and elegant atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a seamless integration with your existing decor.

sutterFinish.finish1: - Shore: Laminate in high gloss finish
sutterFinish.finish2: - Frosty white and tahiti samoa teak: Laminate in matte finish

storageFeature.feature1: - The under-sink cabinet provides organised storage for cleaning supplies, detergents, and utility items.
storageFeature.feature2: - Integrated compartments help neatly arrange dishwashing essentials such as scrubbers and liquid dispensers.
storageFeature.feature3: - Pull-out storage units beneath the sink maximise space utilisation while ensuring easy accessibility.
storageFeature.feature4: - Concealed plumbing design allows efficient use of cabinet space while maintaining a clean and organised look.

specialFeature.specialFeature1: - Stainless steel or premium material construction ensures durability and long-lasting performance.
specialFeature.specialFeature2: - Integrated drainboard design improves functionality by providing space for drying utensils.
specialFeature.specialFeature3: - Modern sink designs enhance kitchen aesthetics while ensuring efficient water flow and usage.
specialFeature.specialFeature4: - Easy-to-clean surfaces maintain hygiene while supporting everyday kitchen activities.

Whether it's a compact or spacious space saving kitchen design, our designs focus on smart layouts that maximise space and enhance comfort. Featuring 2026 trends like minimalist aesthetics, smart lighting solutions, and custom finishes, these space saving kitchen designs create a harmonious and elegant atmosphere. All designs are fully customisable to suit your space, style preferences, and budget—ensuring a seamless integration with your existing decor.
